runs.comm: begins in electrifying fashion as he gets the Indian factions going with a divine square drive to this wide, full delivery outside off. Brilliant start for Rohit and India are on the go
bowls a length delivery, just outside off, which is defended away
length outside off which is just a shade away from the bat as it nipped away on its line to the keeper
fullish length slanting in from outside off. Rohit presents a dead, straight bat in response
straying down the pads as Rohit tickles this away through fine leg to get this to the rope. Looks like it was leg byes though upon second viewing
once again too straight on middle and leg as this is just nudged away to the leg side
starts with a nervy bouncer on middle which is allowed to fly through to the keeper. Looks as if he had dragged it a touch. Its a big occasion for the young lad
another bouncer, along a good line which cramps Dhawan for any space
found a wonderful line going across Dhawan on middle and off. This one bowled just back of a length as Shikhar had no space to work with
reaches out to this back of a length going across, steering this away to the fielder at point
fullish length delivery, on the pads, which is left unpunished as Dhawan is late on the flick
overpitched, and in the slot, as Dhawan obliges with a sumptuous cover drive which blitzes away to the extra-cover rope

too easy for someone of Rohit's considerable talent. Pitched up on middle and pushed straight back with the full face, as this one just gathered momentum along the carpet to find the boundary. Sheer elegance from the right-hander
onto the back foot now as he keeps out this back of a length outside his off peg
tries to guide this back of a length away off the back foot through cover, but is held by the close-in fielder
looks to get away a drop single towards the point region, but hits it a bit too well to the fielder
defends this length delivery outside of off towards the bowler

back of a length, outside of off, which Rohit is drawn into playing, but the extra bounce has him surprised as he opens the face a touch to run this towards the slip fielder on the bounce. Would have been interesting had it been struck firmer to the fielder
full delivery, angling in on off, which is struck back to the bowler
picks the vacant space at backward square as he fetches this back of a length outside off, and manupilates it away with a pull towards the square leg boundary. Smart shot with the fielder on offer
gets right on top of this back of a length outside his off stump
has a go at this full delivery, outside off, with this one straightening on him as he went for the drive
effortless flick to this fuller length off the pads as he picks out the deep fine leg fielder
delivers a sharp bouncer outside of off which is called one for the over
back of a length which bends into Dhawan as he defended off the back foot
short length, going across, which is punched away to the short cover in place
length delivery on the pads which Dhawan is late on as he attempted to get it away behind square. Doesn't prevent them from running the leg bye though
straying on the pads as this one is tucked away towards midwicket

full delivery which is met with the full face as it angled in. Shikhar was late on the call though, as he slipped in an effort to make up the pace, before finally regrouping to get to the other end. Would have been a calamitous way to go had the mid-on fielder been more aware
content to run the drop single to this length delivery going across. Hustles hard to beat the fielder from mid-off, who ends up taking a shy at the stumps
begins from round the wicket as Shikhar is able to steer this one tossed up outside off towards extra-cover
goes back over the wicket now to the right-hander, with Rohit defending this tossed up delivery on and around off
solid, front foot defence employed by Rohit to this one darted in on middle and off
fends away this one darted in on middle
this time is able to guide it past the bowler's right to pickup a single through long on
jabs away this flighted delivery, from round the wicket, with the fielder at extra-cover called into play
rocks forward to this fuller length outside his off stump
length delivery, outside off, which is glided away purposefully through third man
gets away a cut through the deep cover region, with the timing just spot on enough to get to the rope. Nifty punch off the back foot from the Delhi southpaw
short of a length, going across, which is jabbed away to the silly mid-off fielder. Mortaza not quite looking the part so far...
waits for this length ball to arrive to him before punching away through the covers to pickup some more runs
once again waits for this to come on to him before finessing this back of a length delivery through third man with consummate ease
continues from round the wicket to the left-hander, with Dhawan just keeping this one out that slid in from outside off
rock steady as he defends this latest offering from Nasir on the front foot
now comes down the track, before blazing away a drive to the man at mid-off
ekes away a run off the pads to this one sliding in on middle and leg
goes back over now, with Rohit content to negotiate this floated delivery towards the leg side
eases down the track before lofting, with a turn of the face, over the extra-cover region. So languid as he approached the ball, before executing with precision

shortish length and Dhawan is able to pull this, albeit not in total control, over midwicket for a couple. Much too short from the Bangladeshi skipper. Really doesn't look to be bowling in full flow at the moment

Wonderful timing off Dhawan's blade as he short-arm jabs this push through midwicket, getting enough on it to beat the chasing fielder to the rope. Didn't look to put a lot into the stroke, but the result is all that matters
attacks this length delivery, going across him, with the ball getting an under-edge as it went through to the keeper
resolute in defence as he keeps out this length delivery on middle and leg
fuller length, on middle and leg, which is nudged away straight to the close-in fielder on the leg side
meets this fullish length with the full face, but picks out the mid-off fielder soon after
able to nurdle a single through the long on region thanks to the mishap from the bowler in fielding the ball
another one which is eased away, through long on now, as the batsmen exchange ends
looks to punish this long hop, but ends up belting it back towards the bowler on the bounce. Still allowed the run because of the deflection from the bowler through long on
looks to force away a drive through the covers, but fails in his attempt
now guides away a run through long off to get off the strike
fends away this delivery darted in on middle and off to end the mandatory powerplay overs
begins round the wicket as he dishes a low full toss which is struck back to him on the bounce
better from the bowler, with this one defended away towards the off side
a touch shorter as Dhawan sat back to work this away through long on
onto the front foot to keep out this Mahmudullah special
gets into excellent position to cart away this slider on middle and leg towards the square-leg boundary, with the boundary rider in the deep doing a superb job to save a boundary
now nudges away a run through long on to end the over
shortish length, outside off, which is defended away by the batsman
fulller length, just outside off, which is negotiated well by the batsman
nicely forward as he keeps out this back of a length outside his off stump
short ball, outside off, which is pulled away through midwicket
goes after this back of a length, flying across him, but is late on the delivery. Looked ungainly as he attempted the swish
covers the line of this back of a length on middle and leg
fails to get away this shot through the off side
now guides away a run through long off to get off the strike
onto the front foot as he works this away through long on
onto the front foot as he keeps out this one darted in outside off
content to just tuck away this delivery going down middle and leg, with the ball ending up at long on
punches away to the man at mid-off to end another good over for Bangladesh
shortish length, outside off, which is fended away by the batsman
fullish length, just outside off, which is re-directed through the leg side for a comfortable single
pulls away this shortish length off his hips towards deep backward square
fullish length, outside off, which is run away through the gully region
shortish length which is tucked away on the leg side with soft hands
glances away a single off the pads through midwicket, but is held to just the one as he looked to return for the second
darts in one on middle and leg which is defended on the front foot
hurries him with a flatter delivery that is eased away on the leg side
tries to now get away the bowler with a drive through him, but Nasir is on top of it
quicker one which is nurdled down to long on
negotiates this tight line towards the mid-on fielder
releases the pressure with a skip down the track before smoking Nasir straight down the ground to bring up the first maximum of the innings
short of a length which is defended away towards the off side
surprises him with a bouncer which holds up on Dhawan as he looked to keep it down, with the ball bobbling off the face towards the bowler, but luckily not near enough for Rubel to get to it
sends down another bouncer which is allowed to fly through to the keeper

sends yet another quick bouncer which Dhawan looks to hook out of the ground, but seems to be a touch late on it. It flies high to Mushfiqur, who instantaneously goes up for the review, with the bowler following suit. The umpire, though, is not at all interested. Perhaps all just a big show for the possible wide? Snicko doesn't seem to show anything though
full length, on the pads, which is tucked away efficiently by Dhawan on the leg side
on a good length and outside off. Rohit stylishly opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man for a single
tosses one up on leg which is guided away through long on for one
opens the face to this glide through third man, hitting this into the space in order to come back for two

comes down the track to try and drive Shakib through the covers, but the flight beats him as he went with the down swing. Mushfiqur is alert to the stumping chance as he collects this before whipping off the bails in a flash. The back foot looked like it might be dragging outside of the crease. Replays show that Dhawan indeed has his back foot outside the crease when the bails were successfully removed. Huge roar from the Bangladeshi contingent at the MCG as Shikhar is given his marching orders
straightaway Kohli is able to get off the mark as he drills away a brace through the covers, with the ball ending up at deep extra-cover
glanced to short fine, sent back by Rohit
into position quickly to drive this one down to long on to keep the strike
gets right under this sharp bouncer from Rubel, which is ultimately wided by the umpire
back of a length now, outside off, which is kept out by Kohli
length delivery, outside off, which is defended by Kohli
length again, outside of off, which is struck away to the close-in fielder on the off side
short of a length, outside off, which is negotiated well by the batsman

Kohli is gone. Bangladesh have a big wicket here. Delivers a fullish length delivery, pitched wide outside off, as Kohli is instinctively drawn into the drive, with the ball catching the outside edge to fly over to the keeper, who is able to take a good, low catch to this right to pluck a huge, huge wicket for the Bangla tigers. There was some away shape to the ball, which also played a part in the dismissal
short ball, outside off, which Jinks smartly allows through to the keeper
gets in a good stride before tucking away this delivery sliding down through the leg side
nicely on the front foot to keep out this floated delivery on middle
content to defend this delivery spun in from outside off
able to get away the punch through long on to get off the hot seat
comes down the pitch to play a front foot defence, with the ball hitting the pad, but he was safe
can't do anymore than keep out this latest Shakib special on off stump
length delivery, on middle and leg, which is fended away on the leg side
fullish length, slanting in from outside off, as Rahane looked to re-direct this through mid-on, but doesn't quite get it away so
shortish length which is tucked away by Rahane on the leg side as they scamper for the quick single
pulls away this short of a length outside his off stump, getting this away quite deftly in the end through long leg
almost gets Rahane to drag on this length delivery which skids through on and around off, with the ball keeping low as he looked to get this away
fullish length, on middle, which is flicked away through midwicket to retain the strike
tossed up on and around off as this is defended back towards the bowler
now looks to get away a run on the leg side, but the close-in fielders at short leg and leg slip keep him honest
now steers away a run through long on to get off the strike
dead-bats this slider on middle and leg, with the ball dropping quite close to his feet in the end
another one which he negotiates away softly on the off side
weight on the back foot as he guides this one through the long on region for one
just cuts away this length delivery outside off as they scamper the quick single
looks to ease away a run on the on side, but is held by the close-in fielder
delivers a slightly back of a length on and around off which is kept out by Rahane
short, outside off, and punched away towards sweeper cover as Rohit takes the strike
keeps out this back of a length, angling in from outside off, as this one is chopped away towards the slip region
shortish length which is tucked off the pads behind of square as the batsmen are able to cross for the run
driven expansively through the covers, but only gets a singular run added to his tally for his efforts
square drives the bowler through the sweeper cover region as a misfield inside of the ring allows for the second
slipping down the leg side now as Rahane gets away a fine sweep. Called runs off the bat
eases away a single on the off side with consummate ease
looks to whip away a single through midwicket, but the close-in fielder is all over this
is late on this one which turns in from off, as the eventual inside-edge onto the pad allows for a leg bye as the ball continues on through third man
short of a length, outside off, which is struck away to the short mid-off fielder
looks to get away a single on the on side now, but picks out the man at square-leg
attempts a glance off the hips, but is just not able to find the open space as square-leg hares on the ball
content to get away a single through midwicket now as the batsmen look to rotate the strike
back of a length, slanting in from outside off, as this is defended with a nice, straight bat
fullish delivery, outside off, which is re-directed away straight to mid-on to end the over
beaten by the flight as he looked to come down to work away a single through mid-on, but the ball ends up spinning into the pads before bobbling over to the off side
this one slows up on Rohit as he executed a drive on the off side, with the pair able to make it through for the run
helps this one off the pads through the leg side to rotate the strike once more
looking to steer away a single through cover, before this was mishit away towards midwicket
advances down before re-adjusting his stroke to defend this one back to Shakib
sliding down the leg side as the leg slip is able to save a certain boundary after Rohit looked to sweep this hard round the corner
just not coming on for Rahane as he drives back this length delivery outside off to the bowler
another one which he looks to get away through mid-off, but is unable to find the requisite space
full, inswinging delivery on middle and leg, which is turned away towards the mid-on fielder
length delivery, on middle, which is flicked away to the midwicket fielder on the ring
helps India reach 100 with a flick to the midwicket region, with the pair returning for a brace
fortuitous for Rahane as he looked to punch away Taskin through the covers, but ends up getting an outside edge through the slip cordon to find the third man boundary
defends away this flatter delivery on middle and leg
advances down to go inside-out through the covers, but the timing was not spot on
gets deep in his crease to try and slam away a boundary square-off-the-wicket with a pull to the on side, but ends up finding the deep square-leg fielder
brings up his workmanlike fifty with a push through long on. Met with relieved cheers from the Indian contingent. Really has to put his head down as he shoulders the hopes of a nation
fends away this one darted in on middle and leg towards the leg side
waits on the back foot before working this one back to Shakib, who ends up diving low to his left in his follow through to pounce on the ball

full delivery on middle and off, and suddenly Rohit has gone back to his vintage self as he just flicks away this straight delivery effortlessly through the vacant midwicket region for a boundary. Balance was just perfect there from the Mumbai maverick bat
now onto the back foot to pull away the bowler through the same region. Rahane wanted to come back for the second, but Rohit put his foot down
pitched up outside off as Rahane's hand comes off the bat handle as he looked to drive through cover
full delivery, outside off, which is punched away towards the man in the deep at sweeper cover
fetches this one outside off with the pull, but is stopped in the end by deep midwicket

fuller delivery, outside off, and Rahane's struggle has come to an end as he mistimes the loft over extra-cover, with the bat turning in his hand, as the ball ends up just to the left of Shakib, who dives in the end as he claimed it. Bangladesh cock-a-hoop after that dismissal. India looking in some trouble now at 115 for 3. Hilarity ensues as Taskin and Mashrafe went for the celebratory chest-bump, which they fail on the first occassion, before trying again to save face. This time however, they both fail miserably as Taskin slips. Comical end to a key wicket there for Bangladesh
spears one in from outside off as Raina got onto the front foot to defend
looks to sweep this slider going down the pads past the short backward square, but fails in his attempt
strikes this one darted in on off towards the bowler in his follow through
anyways, back to the action, and Nasir delivers this one far too down leg as Raina appears to have got some bat on it as it went down fine leg. Called byes in the end
gets away a single through the leg side to bring Rohit on strike
darts in a quicker one, on middle, which is struck back to the bowler to end a rather amusing over for the players, although I suspect not one for Aleem Dar...
waits on the back foot as he looked to glide away this short of a length delivery, going across him. Ends up not getting it too far away in the end
shuffles over a touch before hooking this short, leg-side delivery to the man at deep fine leg
fails to get away this cut to this short, wide delivery outside his off stump
drills this half-volley outside of off, but picks out the man at mid-off almost instantaneously. Two chances there for Rohit to get away a boundary now
dishes out a slow, wide yorker which Rohit is able to grope at and angle away through third man for a single

sliver of fortune for Raina as Taskin, who has bowled quite well, gets an outside edge to this attempted drive through the covers on the up, with the ball catching the outside edge to fly past the slip to the third man rope. Could have gone to hand there, but it is four more to India's total
able to get away a single through mid-off, but that was not where he intended to go as he had set him up initially for the midwicket tap
gets in a good stride before working this one back to the bowler, who delivers this from round the wicket
executes the drop single through the cover region to perfection as Rohit hares to the other end
drags this one well down the leg side as Rohit lets it through for sundries
this one holds up on Rohit as he went for the push past the bowler, with Nasir running full tilt to his left in an attempt to get at this half-chance. Nasir punches the ground in frustration
eases away a single through the long off region
slams away this drifted delivery on middle towards the leg side
and straight away he is sent to the backward point boundary with a fierce cut to this short and wide loosener outside off. Lucky to avoid the flying backward point fielder as this went over
now tucks away a run on the leg side, but some sloppy backing up allows the pair to add two extra runs
straying on the pads as Raina looked to tickle this one away fine, but the keeper is able to get his body behind it in the end. Can't prevent the leg bye though

takes this one from outside off before placing it expertly behind of square in the vacant space as these two run the first one sublimely enough, and despite a slip from Rohit at the non-striker's, he is able to come back for the second with any undue pressure
on the front foot as he negotiates this fullish length carefully on the off side
half-volley, outside of off, as Rohit just opens the face enough to get this to a wide, third man position
flatter delivery, on middle and leg, which is guided away through long on
goes round the wicket to the southpaw, with Raina easing away this delivery spun in from outside off
tries to get a run through the mid-on region, but fails to pick the space
now gets away a single just behind of square with a flick outside off
Rohit tucks away a run through square-leg
gets nicely behind this one slid in off, with the ball beating the bowler's dive to go down to long on in the end
looks to tuck away a run on the leg side, but is held by the close-in fielder

gets far too across as Mashrafe goes up straightaway for the appeal. The umpire doesn't appear interested though, with Raina running the leg bye, but Mashrafe is adamant he has got his man. Time for a review. No bat involved when this struck the pad. Ball tracking shows this one pitching outside of leg, but only just. Looks like just over half the ball had strayed that margin. Close shout from Bangladesh. Really was so close there. Almost 51% there
really flirting with his luck here as he almost gets an outside edge to this attempt dab down through third man
able to glide away a run through backward point as he opened the face a touch
controls this dab through third man as he is able to just get this away past the keeper's dive to find the third man boundary. Pure class from Rohit
looks to execute the drop single as this one is hit away through point, but ends up timing it a bit more sweetly than he would have liked
darts one in on middle and off from round the wicket. Defended by the batsman off the back foot
comes down before playing this one to the left of the bowler as Nasir runs full tilt to get at this delivery before they could steal a run
into position quickly to manipulate the ball away through midwicket
drives away this delivery outside off towards the mid-off region
looks for the single through square-leg, but Rohit sends him back
eases away a single down to long off to keep the strike
Raina makes the first move as he advances down to loft Mashrafe over the covers for a sublime boundary
shimmies over a touch to the off side before clipping away this fullish length through the midwicket region

looks for the dab through backward point, and times this sweetly enough to beat the man on the ring, and short third man, to the boundary. Mashrafe is befuddled at how that one managed to get through the two fielders?
strays on the pads now as Raina glances this one straight to the square-leg fielder
length delivery, going across, as Raina just about works this one away square off the wicket on the off side
length delivery, on the pads, which is flicked away straight to square-leg to end the over
comes down the track and Raina sends this one high over long on with a mighty heave as this one has enough on it to sail over the rope. Raina looking to up the ante a bit now
now looks to get away a sensible single on the leg side, but fails to work this away
a touch flatter from the bowler, and angling on the pads, as this one is nurdled away through midwicket
slow in the air as Rohit is late on this delivery as he looked for the tap on the leg side
another one drifted in and holding up on Rohit as he looked to fend away
uses the angle of this delivery well to slog-sweep over the close-in fielders behind square to find a boundary through long leg. Calculated risk that comes off for the right-hander
full delivery, on middle and leg, which is clubbed away rather awkwardly through square on the leg side. Looks like he was rushed as he wanted to go for the hoick over midwicket
works away a run through the extra-cover region as Raina comes back on strike
low, full toss outside of leg and Raina is wise to it as he positions himself to get this away leg-side with the turn of the bat. Ends up racing away through long leg for a welcome boundary
short of a length and clipped off the pads as Raina hares to the other end
short and wide as Rohit slices this away through third man, but the man in the deep is able to get behind it comfortably
full, on middle and leg, as this is hoicked away over to deep midwicket for a single
length delivery, on middle, which is tucked away towards midwicket, with Rohit ushering Raina to run two all the time, which the pair are able to complete in the end
full delivery, on middle, which Raina is able to flick away through the leg side
Taskin delivers a back of a length which is run away off the face through third man
now glides away a single through third man as he gets this wide of the slip in place now
glances away this leg-side delivery through the fine leg region
able to get away a single close to the body on the off side as he keeps the strike
overpitched delivery, outside of off, which is struck away through mid-off as Rohit moves into the 90s
guides away a single off the back foot through long off as this back of a length delivery was delivered across him
cuts away this shortish delivery through the cover region

dishes a waist-height full toss which is clubbed away instinctively towards deep midwicket, with the fielder in the deep coming forward to claim the catch. There is an initial stirring from the Bangladeshi fans when they see it is Rohit who was dismissed, but, lo and behold, Rubel has been called for a no-ball. This one due to being over the waist. Replays show, however, that the call would have been marginal. The umpire's call though, was a lot more decisive. Big, big break there for India.

some more luck, this time from Raina, as he looks to tonk this short delivery, going across him, high over midwicket, but ends up top-edging over towards the area, but there were no fielders in the vicinity

Raina makes the Bangladeshi fielders pay next ball with this on-the-up drive through extra-cover, with the bat turning in his hand as he executed the stroke. Ends up getting enough on it though, despite the chasing fielders, to just get to the rope
now flicks away this fullish length off the pads towards the leg side to end a strong over for the Indians
content to work away a single on the leg side to get Rohit on strike
steers away a single off the back foot through long on

executes an emphatic short-arm pull to bring up his half-century. Looks to have sprung into some vital form here for India as he adds to his ton from the previous match. India will need him to keep going though
Rohit able to move to 96 with a glide to this delivery going outside off. Gets enough on this to beat the short third man fielder to the rope
steers away a run now through the covers as Raina is brought on strike

fielders inside the circle at fine leg as Raina utilises the leg-side slant of the delivery to pull this over the fielder to find the rope. Brings up the 100-run stand, with the partnership, now at 102, coming off just 80 balls
short, and wide as Rohit cuts this away through sweeper cover, but isn't able to blaze it away to the boundary as he would have liked
fullish length, on middle and off, as Raina just steps over to the off side, before flicking this one away through backward square to find another boundary. Smart batting from the left-hander
now nurdles away a run through midwicket as the cheers goes up across the ground as Rohit assumes the strike
moves to 99 with an expertly-placed dab outside his off stump as Raina sneaks through at the danger end before the shy from the close-in fielder
steers away a run now off the back foot through long on as Rohit is given one final chance this over to reach the mark

and Rohit gets to a maiden World Cup century with a push through the covers as he removes the helmet to salute the crowd. Has been an immense knock with his side playing a real, high-pressure fixture. Can he now go on to produce a real, seismic, score? Also called a no-ball as well with just four inside the circle
now eases away a single through the long on region as the over finally comes to a close
Rohit plays inside the line of this one drifting in from outside off
now gets away a single through long off
is beaten in the flight as he looked to hoick this one away over midwicket
gets low as he looks for the sweep round the corner, but can't quite get it away
driven away firmly towards deep cover
fires in one on middle and leg when he saw Raina advancing, with the left-hander readjusting to play this away through long on
tucks away this back of a length through the leg side
punches away this back of a length outside off through mid-off, with a misfield in the region ushering in the run in the end. Mashrafe not at all pleased with the effort
looking to be adventurous as he came down to try and loft Mashrafe over long on, but ends up spooning this just to the right of the incoming mid-on fielder, who is unable to get to it
looks for the drive on the up off the back foot now, but ends up hitting a bit straighter to the bowler

looking for the almighty heave over midwicket, but ends up top-edging this length delivery high over his head, with Mushfiqur, who called it early, having to take a few paces back before settling under it nicely. Ends an integral knock from Raina, who has really put India into a strong position here in the latter overs

sheer class from Rohit. Unbelievable timing from the right-hander as he punched this one off the back foot, with the ball gathering enough momentum in the end to beat the ensuing sweeper cover fielder to the boundary
length delivery, shaping on leg, which Dhoni fails to get away with a clip
pitches it up outside off as Dhoni fails to get away the strike through the covers
flicks away this leg-side slanting delivery to deep square-leg

short ball, outside off, as Dhoni pulls this away towards midwicket, with MS calling two the whole way. Able to turn on the jets sufficiently enough to get to the non-striker's end in the nick of time
waits on this short, wide delivery, as he hoped to get it past short third man, but ends up finding the fielder instead
chases after this short delivery outside off, with Dhoni late on it as Mushfiqur played clean-up behind
sends in a yorker just outside off which is struck away towards the long off region

stand and deliver from Rohit as he just lofts this full pitched delivery, on middle, high over the long off boundary as this just sailed away gracefully into the crowd. Stunning stroke from the right-hander
now targets the vacant space at cow corner with a powerful swat across the line that sends the white ball screaming away to the rope
sensibly eases away a run on the off side to get MS on strike
short length which is hooked away fine through long leg
becoming a bit too easy for Rohit as he now slams away uppishly through the extra-cover region to find the boundary in a hurry
carts away this short of a length through midwicket, with the captain wanting two, but Rohit keeps him to just the one
cuts away this shortish, wide length fiercely towards point, but finds the fielder soon after
delivers a sharp bumper which is called wide by the umpire
connects sweetly with this short ball as he dispatches this one well over the cow corner stand. Made a wonderful sound as bat connected with leather
shuffles across and then picks the change-up slower delivery, which is smoked over square leg.

backs away to the leg side before looking for the heave through the covers, with this one falling just short of the extra-cover fielder in the end. Some boos ring across the ground because of the proximity of the fielder to the ball there

ends the Rohit special with a full, inswinging delivery which the right-hander looked to glide away through third man as he got low. Ends up playing this one on after the ball hit the ground. Ends one of the all-time best knocks for India in a crucial World Cup match
fends away this one which comes at him rather slow in the air on off
another one defended away on the front foot by the batsman
belts away this one darted in on middle and leg towards the long on region. Didn't really time it away though
able to get his first ball away for a boundary as he advanced down before getting low to reach out to this one darted in wide of off. Ends up racing away through third man for a boundary
dropped a touch short as Jadeja is able to scythe this one away uppishly through the covers to find the extra-cover rope
able to get away a run now through the long off region as he keeps the strike next over
full delivery on middle and off which is chipped straight to mid-off, with the fielder throwing in a shy at the non-striker's, but with no one backing up, they are afforded an extra run
goes in for the yorker once more, except this time Jadeja is able to clip it away off the pads behind of square to find a boundary

full again, on middle and leg, as Jadeja places this one beautifully through midwicket, with some rather poor fielding on the rope allowing this one to just snake across the rope. Looked like he wanted to go in for the dive, but ends up allowing the ball through soon after. Mashrafe is about to lose his head here. Looking absolutely furious now
slower ball, on leg, which is carted away on the leg side to bring MS on strike
slams away this fuller length through the long on region as he races through the first run in order to come back in time for the second

looking for quick runs with a thwack through the leg side to this shortish length, but ends up getting a leading edge high over towards the cover point region, with the fielder getting under it rather comfortably in the end

Taskin just can't stay out of the limelight as Ashwin looked to ramp this short delivery through third man. This one looked to have died on him before he could get under the ball. Still saves a boundary though in the end
clears the front leg to try and slam this fullish length over long on, but ends up mishitting more towards the off side
delivers an inswinging yorker that is just dug away towards the mid-on region
another full delivery which is clipped away now towards midwicket. They are able to scamper through to get India to 300, which is met with resounding cheers across this vast ground
works away this fuller delivery honing on off towards the long on region
sends in another one in the blockhole, this one outside off, as the ball is dug away towards the off side to end India's innings
